p: Moreover, this triterpene glycoside is able to reduce the invasive growth of keloid fibroblasts by inhibiting the growth differentiation factor-9/mitogen-activated protein kinase/Smad pathway [ 68]. In a comparative study evaluating the effects of asiaticoside, alpha-chymotripsin and collagenase on an excision wound model, the use of an ointment with asiaticoside could achieve accelerated wound healing, prevent keloid formation, and a nearly invisible scar formation [ 69].
